column3: | It ain't about how hard you hit. It's about how hard you can get hit and keep moving forward.
| I'm gonna make him an offer he can't refuse.
| Say hello to my little friend!
| Life is like a box of chocolates. You never know what you're gonna get.
| I'm the king of the world!
| I do wish we could chat longer
column4: but I'm having an old friend for dinner.

column3: | This is the day you will always remember as the day you almost caught Captain Jack Sparrow.
| May the Force be with you.
| The hills are alive with the sound of music.

column4: and we are the dreamers of dreams.

column3: | Take your stinking paws off me
| Nothing very bad could happen to you there.
